room_title: Escape room "Game of Espionage" by Breakout Escape Rooms in Ann Arbor
review: Really enjoyed this Escape Room. Really clever hint mechanisms and the production value for the rooms is right on. Friendly, polite staff (thank you, Josh!). Brought a group of five for the Espionage room. We were super close but didn't make it out in time. Had a different group for the Circus one made it out in respectable time. Clues are open-ended enough to be difficult, but closed enough that you typically know when you've solved them. Worth it.

room_title: Escape room "Game of Espionage" by Breakout Escape Rooms in Ann Arbor
review: Enjoyed The Game of Espionage. Lots of puzzles, challenging and fun! 10/10, would rob CEO again.
